component_text.text: Hover over an item in this panel to look at its effects.
[[i]]In lavish Pleasure Palace chambers the Denied One's [[img:icon_decadence]][[/img]]Decadence is made manifest, giving her the means to proliferate exquisite pleasures and terrors alike.[[/i]]

[[col:green]][[b]]Marks of Vindictiveness[[/b]] grant army abilities that can be equipped in the pre-battle screen.\n\n[[col:green]]Marks are always available, each purchase granting three ability uses. [[img:icon_decadence]][[/img]]Decadence may be spent to permanently improve abilities for all future battles.
Effects after this Mark is upgraded:

default.name: default
default.tooltip: This Mark can be upgraded by spending [[img:icon_decadence]][[/img]]Decadence

default.name: default
default.tooltip: This Mark can be upgraded by spending [[img:icon_decadence]][[/img]]Decadence
